document_data.name: Inri
document_data.mainbody: '''Inri''' is an elven sorcerer and a member of the adventuring group, the [[Moor Runners]].
document_data.Description: Inri has hair like gold and a golden complexion. Her eyes are a pink and red hue. She normally wears a robe and veils that shift color in the light She wears silver bracers on her arms.
document_data.Personality:
{{Sectstub}}

Inri is the companion and lover of [[Thard of the Sky Ponies]]. Inri rides her horse sidesaddle.
document_data.History: Inri was a member of the Moor Runners for years. In [[1364 DR]] she was killed by [[Rylatar'ralah'tyma]], who in human form beheaded Inri with her [[Katana]].
